previewArticle.title: US Open Cup: Seattle Sounders, LA Galaxy begin quest as 4th round wraps up | Matchday Preview

recapArticle.title: Seattle dominate PSA Elite, Chicago win weather-shortened game | US Open Cup Recaps

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Stefan Ishizaki with a shot that forces a diving save by Evan Newton. Great save by the AZ 'keeper. #AZvLA #USOC2014

timelineItems.comment: Match ends, Arizona United 1, LA Galaxy 2.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: What a huge performance from Gyasi Zardes: http://t.co/AdjbOeOhoj #USOC2014 #AZvLA http://t.co/ft0LoxGCaw

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: What a huge performance from Gyasi Zardes: http://t.co/AdjbOeOhoj #USOC2014 #AZvLA http://t.co/ft0LoxGCaw

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Less than 15 minutes left in the first half of #AZvLA, we're still scoreless. Watch the #USOC2014 game here: http://t.co/IwCvtPBqtW

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 36' Arizona goal. Matt Kassel puts Arizona ahead 1-0. #AZvLA

timelineItems.comment: First Half ends, Arizona United 1, LA Galaxy 0.
Second Half begins Arizona United 1, LA Galaxy 0.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: GALAXY GOAL! Gyasi Zardes nods it home to equalize. We're right back in this one. #USOC2014 #AZvLA

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We're now up 2-1 for all those keeping score at home. #USOC2014 #AZvLA

timelineItems.name: AZ United Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@LAGalaxy and #AZUnitedSC take to the pitch! #BeatLA #WalkUnited http://t.co/B4o7fu44Zv

timelineItems.name: AZ United Soccer
timelineItems.text: .@LAGalaxy and #AZUnitedSC take to the pitch! #BeatLA #WalkUnited http://t.co/B4o7fu44Zv

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: We are underway from Peoria. Watch #AZvLA here - http://t.co/PGIMVnvvpl

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: 78' Samuel enters the match for Chandler Hoffman. Let's see if the big Brazilian can get a goal. #AZvLA #USOC2014

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: LA Galaxy
timelineItems.text: Gargan with a cross that the AZ GK is forced to come out and handle. Watch #AZvLA here: http://t.co/PGIMVnvvpl #USOC2014

timelineItems.comment: Second Half ends, Arizona United 1, LA Galaxy 2.
